        • fluentWait

          public static org.openqa.selenium.WebElement fluentWait(org.openqa.selenium.By locator,
                                                        org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver driver,
                                                        long timeout)
          fluentWait
          • Uses Selenium FluentWait method
          • Looks for an element identifier locator defined as a By type for an overall period of time define by the timeout, polling every 250 ms
          • Returns the WebElement once found or null if not found inside timeout limit
            Parameters:
            locator - the By locator
            driver - the RemoteWebDriver driver
            timeout - the long timeout
            Returns:
            the web element

            Returns:
